title: Gender issues effect on political power for women

content.question: Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes. Between 1450 and 1800, many women gained power as rulers, some as reigning queens, others as regents. Identify two such powerful women and discuss how issues of gender, such as marriage and reproduction, influenced their ability to obtain and exercise power.

frqParts.text: Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes. skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
